name: ScrawlBrawl
summary:
A collection of free party games for 4-30 players.

Games require one shared view (TV, stream, or screen share), in addition to one device per player (mobile or desktop).

Games revolve entirely around user provided prompts, so every play-through will be different. Though there are suggestions for players who do not want to think of prompts.

The games range in focus from drawings, witty wordplay, memorization, to deduction skills.
